references.reason: This paper's model for citation dynamics provided the foundation for adapting a similar approach to model the adoption of open-weight AI models.

references.paper_title: On the Opportunities and Risks of Foundation Models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of the opportunities and risks associated with foundation models, which heavily informs the discussion on the governance of the ecosystem.
This paper directly addresses the legal and ethical challenges related to training open-weight AI models, highlighting the importance of fair use considerations in the field.

references.paper_title: Hazards from Increasingly Accessible Fine-Tuning of Downloadable Foundation Models
references.reason: This paper emphasizes the importance of governance mechanisms for open-weight AI models and identifies potential risks associated with accessible fine-tuning.

references.paper_title: Risks and Opportunities of Open-Source Generative AI
references.reason: This paper provides a holistic evaluation of the risks and opportunities associated with open-source generative AI, contextualizing the research within a broader discussion of AI governance and security.
